description.value: As a diviner, you master remote viewing and prescience, learning information that can transform investigations, research, and battle strategies. You understand that knowledge is power. You add one 1st-level divination spell (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.True Strike]) to your spellbook. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Diviner's Sight] school spell.
